author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-2180 extended support for collecting perf stats to uima-as aggregates

author: jglick
msg: ...and only warn if actually running AntUnit.

author: astitcher
msg: QPID-3883: Using application headers in messages causes a very large slowdown
Lazily decode FieldTables, holding onto the actual raw bytes
until we really need to decode, if we encode the FieldTable before
decoding it we can just send the raw bytes we captured initially.

author: astitcher
msg: QPID-3883: Using application headers in messages causes a very large slowdown
Cache the size of a field table to prevent recomputation
